testsuite.name: API Testing with cucumber rest assured on https://reqres.in/

testcase.name: Verify get request single user
testcase.classname: API Testing with cucumber rest assured on https://reqres.in/

testcase.name: Verify POST request new user
testcase.classname: API Testing with cucumber rest assured on https://reqres.in/

testcase.name: Verify get request not existed user
testcase.classname: API Testing with cucumber rest assured on https://reqres.in/

testsuite.system-out:
Scenario: Verify get request single user # src/test/resources/features/api.feature:4 Given I set the GET request to "api/users/2" # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.setupGETEndpoint(java.lang.String) {"data":{"id":2,"email":"janet.weaver@reqres.in","first_name":"Janet","last_name":"Weaver","avatar":"https://reqres.in/img/faces/2-image.jpg"},"support":{"url":"https://contentcaddy.io?utm_source=reqres&utm_medium=json&utm_campaign=referral","text":"Tired of writing endless social media content? Let Content Caddy generate it for you."}} When I send the GET request # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.sendGetRequest() actual respond Code = 200 Then The response code should be 200 # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.verifyRespondCode(int) And the response body should contain "janet.weaver@reqres.in" # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.verifyRespondBodyContainsText(java.lang.String)
Scenario: Verify POST request new user # src/test/resources/features/api.feature:11 Given I set the POST Request for endpoint "api/users" # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.setupPOSTEndpoint(java.lang.String) And the request body is: # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.theRequestBodyIs(java.lang.String) {"name":"morpheus","job":"leader","id":"121","createdAt":"2025-08-21T08:25:24.765Z"} When I send the POST Request # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.iSendThePOSTRequest() actual respond Code = 201 Then The response code should be 201 # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.verifyRespondCode(int) And the response body should contain "morpheus" # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.verifyRespondBodyContainsText(java.lang.String)
Scenario: Verify get request not existed user # src/test/resources/features/api.feature:25 Given I set the GET request to "api/users/12323132131212313" # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.setupGETEndpoint(java.lang.String) {"error":"Missing API key"} When I send the GET request # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.sendGetRequest() actual respond Code = 401 Then The response code should be 401 # stepDefinitions.ApiStepDefinitions.verifyRespondCode(int)
